infoCard.name: Toko Buah Tangan
infoCard.address: Jl. Baru No. 36, Kel. Kenten, Kec. Ciwa, Kab. Banyuasin, Medan, Indonesia

gallery.title: Tambolaka necklace
gallery.description: Tambolaka necklace is a stone necklace of the Nusantara series that carries the name of the City in Southwest Sumba, East Nusa Tenggara. The city which is famous for having beautiful coastal views is famous to foreign countries.

gallery.title: Agate necklace
gallery.description: Agate crystal meaning was one of spiritual protection, cleansing their mind to make space for good luck and fortune.

gallery.title: Aspiration necklace
gallery.description: The Aspiration Necklace is a true celebration of timeless elegance. Designed to be paired with the delicate Aspiration Earrings, this necklace is an everyday essential.
